entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:58 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 9:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: WNW 27 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
